item.title: TryFOSS.com PWA
item.author: patrick@tryfoss.com (TryFOSS.com)
item.description: Introduction We all love apps, right? They’re easy to use and at least in theory are verified and provided by a trusted source. But something about apps, in their current state, just doesn’t feel right to an open source enthusiast, does it? Sure, there’s F-Droid which is a great project and a handful of open source phones and/or phone OSes, yet, at the moment these target a pretty specialized audience.

item.title: First post!
item.author: patrick@tryfoss.com (TryFOSS.com)
item.description: Kia Ora, this is TryFOSS.com’s first post, how exciting!

item.title: About TryFOSS.com
item.author: patrick@tryfoss.com (TryFOSS.com)
item.description: TryFOSS.com is a tech blog about FOSS (free open source software) related topics. Open Source TryFOSS.com was created using the following open source software and libraries: CMS/SSG: Hugo ( https://gohugo.io/ ) PWA Service Worker: UpUp ( https://www.talater.com/upup/ ) CSS Framework: Bulma ( https://bulma.io/ ) JS Framework: Alpine.js ( https://alpinejs.dev/ ) Icon Library: Ionicons ( https://ionic.io/ ) Chart Library: Chart.js ( https://www.chartjs.org/ )
